Articles.Content: Hello, I'm pretty sure I correctly installed the BDArmory, but when I launch a craft, the weapon manager GUI says no weapon manager found when I open it. I don't know why it doesn't work, and it's really frustrating. I have reinstalled the mod multiple times to no avail. Please get back to me soon, thanks.

Hello, I'm pretty sure i downloaded the mod correctly, but when I open the GUI for the weapon manager it says "No Weapon Manager Found" I don't why this is happening and i have deleted and reinstalled the mod multiple times to no avail. Please get back to me soon, thanks.

Moved to add-on discussion.    @Flyguy4500, it's usually best to ask this within the mod release thread itself, and provide the requisite logs and such the mod author requests to allow them to figure out what is wrong. 

Your cross-posted threads have also been merged.
You need to put the "weapons manager" part on your craft.

38 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

 

Your cross-posted threads have also been merged. 

Thank you for merging these, I thought the first one got discarded when i accidentally left the site.

I'm actually going to drop this, I'm not interested in fighting bot controlled aircraft, right clicking and hitting fire or assigning is good enough for me, thanks for the responses though! It'd be great if a mod could close this thread please.

Edited August 14, 2020 by Flyguy4500

57 minutes ago, Flyguy4500 said:

Hello, I'm pretty sure i downloaded the mod correctly, but when I open the GUI for the weapon manager it says "No Weapon Manager Found" I don't why this is happening and i have deleted and reinstalled the mod multiple times to no avail. Please get back to me soon, thanks.

You have to put the weapons manager part on your craft you wish to use the BD Armory parts on. Have you tried that yet? Without some log or something to look at, it's hard to understand what the issue is.
I did put the weapon manager on the craft.
